person_say: I've been having problems with my friends at school, and it's stressing me out.
animal_say: It sounds like that’s really weighing on you! There’s a calming bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and stress relief; would you like to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn some mindfulness techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! I'll call on Bruno for you. Get ready to relax and learn some mindfulness techniques!
